TITLE: Implementing mCaptcha Widget in React DESCRIPTION: Example of implementing the mCaptcha widget in a React component using TypeScript. Shows how to configure the widget with a site key and import required dependencies. SOURCE: https://github.com/mcaptcha/glue/blob/master/packages/react/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: tsx CODE: ``` import React, { Component, WidgetConfig } from 'react' import MCaptchaWidget from 'react-glue' import 'react-glue/dist/index.css' class Example extends Component { render() { const siteKey: SiteKey = { key: 'randomSiteKeyAsDisplayedInAdminPanel' } const config: WidgetConfig = { siteKey } return } } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Implementing mCaptcha Widget in Next.js DESCRIPTION: Example of implementing the mCaptcha widget in a Next.js project using JSX. Demonstrates configuration using a widget link URL. SOURCE: https://github.com/mcaptcha/glue/blob/master/packages/react/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: jsx CODE: ``` import React from 'react'; import { MCaptchaWidget } from '@mcaptcha/react-glue'; function Captcha() { const config = { widgetLink: new URL('https://yourdomain.tld/widget/?sitekey=yourstiekey') }; return ( ); } export default Captcha; ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Implementing mCaptcha Widget with TypeScript DESCRIPTION: Creates a custom mCaptcha integration by initializing a Receiver with site configuration and callback function. The implementation demonstrates setup, token handling, and proper lifecycle management including listener registration and teardown. SOURCE: https://github.com/mcaptcha/glue/blob/master/packages/core/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: typescript CODE: ``` const instanceUrl = "https://api.mcaptcha.org"; const siteKey: g.SiteKey = { key: "randomSitekeyasShowninmCaptchaDashboard", instanceUrl: new URL(instanceUrl), }; /** callback function to update hidden input field. Varies for each * framework/ glue implementation */ const cb = (token: string): void => { let input = document.getElementById("mcaptcha__token"); if (input) { input.value = token; } } const config: g.WidgetConfig = { siteKey, }; const r = new Receiver(config, cb.setToken); // register listener when component is mounted/necessary HTML for // callback function is rendered r.listen(); // teardown r.destroy(); ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Implementing mCaptcha Widget in Svelte Component DESCRIPTION: Example of how to import and use the mCaptcha Widget component in a Svelte file. It demonstrates setting up the configuration with a widget link and rendering the Widget component. SOURCE: https://github.com/mcaptcha/glue/blob/master/packages/svelte/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: html CODE: ``` ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Embedding mCaptcha Widget in HTML Form DESCRIPTION: HTML code snippet showing how to integrate mCaptcha widget into a web form. Includes the label, input field for authorization token, widget container, and the required script import from unpkg CDN. SOURCE: https://github.com/mcaptcha/glue/blob/master/packages/vanilla/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: html CODE: ```
let config = { widgetLink: new URL( "{{ your widget link }}"), }; new mcaptchaGlue.default(config); ```
